poem:
### The Absurd Symphony

In the theatre of the sky,  
iron birds hum discordant notes;  
hosannas of war echo—  
each side claims a silent victory.  
Under the uneasy canopy,  
man stands small,  
whispering psalms of defiance  
to gods of power,  
knowing that even the moon  
turns away its face.
